channel.title: Python on Triggered
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Triggered

item.title: Got Static!
item.description: I just made the first step towards moving my whole blog to GitHub and going all static! Content is generated by Pelican, a static site generator, written in Python. Why GitHub, you ask? While I can always push the static content to any of my existing web hosts, there’s a touch of geekness in writing using my favorite editor and publishing by git commits and pushes; thus GitHub. Also, it’s this year that I’m planning to pick up Python programming again, for devops reasons.
